text: The 2020 United States Senate election in Rhode Island will be held on November 3, 2020, to elect a member of the United States Senate to represent the State of Rhode Island, concurrently with the 2020 U.S. presidential election, as well as other elections to the United States Senate, elections to the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections. Incumbent Democratic Senator Jack Reed will seek a fifth term in office against challenger Allen Waters. ==Democratic primary== ===Candidates=== ====Nominee==== *Jack Reed, incumbent U.S. Senator ===Primary results=== ==Republican primary== ===Candidates=== ====Nominee==== *Allen R. title: 2020 United States Senate election in Rhode Island
